Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition -- 1/2% S&U Tax - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half percent (1/2%) (the Tax), from and after January 1, 2021, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease, or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services within the Parish, for a period of Ten (10) years, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purposes of the collection and disposal of solid waste (Garbage) in and for LaSalle Parish (an estimated $1,308,477.00 to be collected at this time during an entire year)?
